import React, { Component } from 'react' import { cursor } from './../../routePlan' import './../styles/form.css' export class form extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { outlet_number: this.props.outlet_number, day: "0", interval: "7", offset: "1" } } handleIntervalChange(event) { this.setState({ interval: event.target.value }); } handleOffsetChange(event) { this.setState({ offset: event.target.value }) } handleDayChange(event) { this.setState({ day: event.target.value }) } render() { return (
